levelList.desc:
On Hit with this Skill: heal 20% of the HP damage dealt (max 20)
[WhenUse] Consume up to 60 [BloodDinner] and gain 1 [BloodScissorPersonalityFirst] for every 6 [BloodDinner] this unit consumed
- If this unit failed to consume [BloodDinner], gain +4 [Laceration] Count
[WhenUse] <style="highlight">Coin Power +1 for every 6 [Laceration] on the target (max 2)</style>
levelList.name: Sewing

coindescs.desc: [OnSucceedAttack] If the target has [LineCuttingPersonality], inflict +1 [Laceration] Count<style="highlight"></style>
[OnSucceedAttack] If the target has [LineCuttingPersonality], inflict +1 [Laceration] Count<style="highlight"></style>

levelList.desc:
On Hit with this Skill: heal 20% of the HP damage dealt (max 20)
[WhenUse] Consume up to 60 [BloodDinner] and gain 1 [BloodScissorPersonalityFirst] for every 6 [BloodDinner] this unit consumed
- If this unit failed to consume [BloodDinner], gain 5 [Laceration]
[WhenUse] If the target has 6+ [Laceration], Coin Power +1<style="highlight"></style>
levelList.name: Scission

levelList.desc:
On Hit with this Skill: heal 30% of the HP damage dealt (max 20)
[BeforeAttack] At 10+ [BloodScissorPersonalityFirst], Atk Weight +1
<style="highlight">- At 20+ [BloodScissorPersonalityFirst], replace the above effect with Atk Weight +2 instead</style>
[WhenUse] If the target has 5+ [Laceration], Coin Power +1
[WhenUse] Clash Power +1 for every 6 [Laceration] on the target (max 2)
[EndSkill] Consume <style="highlight">10</style> [BloodScissorPersonalityFirst] for every Atk Weight gained
[EndSkill] If the target is killed, increase [BloodDinner] by <style="highlight">20</style>. Regain half of [BloodScissorPersonalityFirst] consumed by this Skill (once per turn)
<style="highlight">- If the target is [LineCuttingPersonality], additionally increase [BloodDinner] by 20 more, and gain 5 [BloodScissorPersonalityFirst] (once per turn)</style>
levelList.name: I'll Make You a New Dress!

coindescs.desc:
[OnSucceedAttack] At 10+ [BloodScissorPersonalityFirst], deal +([BloodScissorPersonalityFirst] x <style="highlight">3</style>)% more damage (max <style="highlight">57</style>%)
- At 20+ [BloodScissorPersonalityFirst], deal +([BloodScissorPersonalityFirst] x <style="highlight">4</style>)% more damage instead (max <style="highlight">120</style>%)

levelList.desc:
[WhenUse] At 10+ [BloodScissorPersonalityFirst], Base Power +1<style="highlight">
- At 20+ [BloodScissorPersonalityFirst], gain Base Power +2 instead</style>
[WhenUse] <style="highlight">Coin Power +1 for every 5 [Laceration] on self (max 3)</style>
levelList.name: Quite Discourteous!
